channel.title: Error in runserver.bat, killed other server and don't wanna lose dis one
channel.description:
ok i open up runserver.bat it says server started successfully.normal. then withing a few seconds it says this (which makes all players currently already logged in,even on new chars):
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string " "
at java.lang.integer.parseint(integer.java:447) at java.lang.integer.parseint(integer.java:497) at ShopHandler.loadshops.(shophandler.java:117) at ShopHandler.(init)(ShopHandler.java:30) at server.main(server.java:30)
plz help, this server is my main source of rs money:\ and me as well as every1 else wants to play while typing this 2 ppl kept signing on though it said they currently logged on that made it more difficult -.-

item.title: Error in runserver.bat, killed other server and don't wanna lose dis one
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

Don’t do that. Just delete it and extract it again…

Read full topic

ok
i open up runserver.bat
it says server started successfully.normal.
then withing a few seconds it says this (which makes all players currently already logged in,even on new chars):

Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string "
"

      at java.lang.integer.parseint(integer.java:447)
